mapper.update:
update user
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

user_pic = #{userPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
